about_the_game:
This is a unique VR game that allows you to experience the joy of the wandering of pet cats in the forest. In the dense forest, your pet cat will interact with various animals to start a thrilling adventure.



In the game, the main task of the player is to find animal battle adventures, provided that avoiding danger. The forest is full of various animals, some of them are powerful and weak. When pet cats are close to animals, animals actively launch an attack. Faced with a few animals than themselves or is equivalent to themselves, players can fight bravely; and in the face of powerful animals, players need to choose rationally. Do not act recklessly and avoid unnecessary fighting.
The game setting is very unique. On the one hand, players can enjoy an immersive experience through virtual reality technology. On the other hand, the game also adds strategic elements. Players need to formulate the best action solution based on the shape, aggressiveness and ability of animals. If the pet cat fails in the battle, the player will lose the game progress and return to the birth point. This setting adds the challenge of the game, but also provides players with the opportunity to start. Failure does not mean the end, but the opportunity to start, allowing players to continue to try, learn and progress. I believe the game will give players a new experience, let's try it!



Operation method:
Move : Left handle up/down
Turn: Right handle left/right
Menu: Menu key
Reset: L/R handle trigger
Attack：Right handle trigger
Jump: Left handle trigger

name: Forest Showdown：Cat Hero Battle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE

short_description: This is a unique VR game that allows you to experience the joy of the wandering of pet cats in the forest. In the dense forest, your pet cat will interact with various animals to start a thrilling adventure.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
